Resources
----

One main reference: <a href="https://press.lse.ac.uk/site/books/m/10.31389/lsepress.ame/" target="_blank">**Advanced Macroeconomics: An Easy Guide**</a> by Campante et al.   

Other good books:

- <a href="https://phdmacrobook.org/downloads/" target="_blank">**Macroeconomics** (for PhDs)</a> by Azzimonti et al.;  
- <a href="http://piketty.pse.ens.fr/files/BarroSalaIMartin2004.pdf" target="_blank">**Economic growth**</a> by Barro and Sala-ì-Martin;    
- <a href="https://www.mheducation.com/highered/product/advanced-macroeconomics-romer/M9781260185218.html" target="_blank">**Advanced Macroeconomics** (editor website)</a> by Romer.
